desc:
50% boost to Atk of Light types, greatly boosts Atk relative to remaining HP, adds Light barrier effect to BB/SBB & raises max Atk value from 99999 to 130000
40% Boost to Atk, Def each turn (3 turns max, capping at 120%), boosts Light elemental damage for all allies & considerably raises normal hit amount in Guild Raid
name: The Ace of Spades
